local_intent: Establish gentle table contact at the fold region while holding the cloth, then verify contact.
assumptions: Cloth is grasped and held in the gripper
Robot is positioned at or above the fold region
Fold pose key 'fold_pose' already set on the blackboard
coherence_with_global: Matches the place phase: confirms object in gripper, validates fold_pose availability, checks position at fold region, performs LowerUntilContact with slow approach and given thresholds, and verifies contact.
